root.name: The Sims 2: Celebration Stuff
root.description: Overview "Stuff Packs" for The Sims 2 are collections of new clothing, decorations, furniture, and other miscellaneous items assembled around a particular theme. Unlike the major expansion packs which focus on introducing new gameplay mechanics, these discount priced add-ins seek to supplement existing features by adding more aesthetic variety. Celebration Stuff was the fourth such content addition to be released, and includes a variety of decorations like balloon, streamers, table centerpieces, and festively appointed furniture for all manner of parties. Two new premade, vacant homes are also added to the lot bin where players can manually import them into an existing neighborhood.
